content.question: What is the interval of convergence of the power series <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis, to the n power, times, open parenthesis, x minus 2, close parenthesis, to the n power, and denominator n times 5 to the n power, end fraction " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 3 is less than x, which is less than 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 3 is less than x, which is less than or equal to 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 5 is less than x, which is less than 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 5 is less than x, which is less than or equal to 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative 3 is less than x, which is less than or equal to 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 10.13: (BC ONLY) Radius and Interval of Convergence of Power Series

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
